page.title: 09WE HAVE NO POST OFFICE...
page.content: IN SHELDON WE HAVE NO POST OFFICE,BUT THERE IS ONE AT ASHFORD WHICH IS THE NEAREST.THE POSTMAN COLLECTS THE LETTERS ELEVEN TIMES AND DELIVERS THEM SIX TIMES A WEEK.ANOTHER COMMUNICATION IS THE TELEPHONE,MOST PEOPLE HAVE ONE BUT FOR THOSE WHO DON'T THERE IS ONE IN THE CENTRE OF THE VILLAGE.WE HAVE OVERHEAD TELEGRAPH WIRES WHICH ARE A BIT OF A PROBLEM IN WINTER BECAUSE THE SNOW AND WIND INTERFERES WITH THE TELEPHONE AND TELEVISION.WE HAVE TELEVISIONS AND RADIOS FOR HEADLINES OF THE NEWS,WE GET MORE NEWS FROM THE NEWSPAPER.MOST PEOPLE HAVE NEWSPAPERS DAILY e.g.THE SUN AND THE MIRROR.ONCE A WEEK THE LOCAL PAPERS ARE AVAILABLE e.g.DERBYSHIRE TIMES AND THE MATLOCK MERCURY.WE HAVE A NOTICE BOARD IN SHELDON TO ADVERTISE LOCAL EVENTS AROUND SHELDON.WE HAVE A BUS TO BAKEWELL EVERY MONDAY.
